SELECT cs.semester, cs.courseId, c.name as courseName, oc.classTime, t.name as teacherName, c.credit FROM courseselection cs LEFT JOIN opencourse oc ON cs.semester = oc.semester AND cs.courseId = oc.courseId AND cs.jobNumber = oc.jobNumber LEFT JOIN course c ON cs.courseId = c.courseId LEFT JOIN teacher t ON cs.jobNumber = t.jobNumber WHERE cs.studentId = #{studentId} AND cs.semester = #{semester}
